scripts.generate-types: cd backend && uv run pydantic2ts --module app.schemas --output ../packages/types/src/generated/api.ts --json2ts-cmd ../node_modules/.bin/json2ts
scripts.lint: bun run lint:frontend && bun run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.format: bun run format:frontend && bun run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff format .
